Class ec.vatimpl.Leaf 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.meta.StdObj
           |
           +----ec.vatimpl.Inhabitant
                   |
                   +----ec.vatimpl.Leaf
public class Leaf
extends Inhabitant
implements Tether
A Leaf is an object which is pointed at by inhabitants (guests and stewards) which in turn points to an out-of-vat object. Note that Leaves are generally constructed in a non-vat thread but all other methods should only ever be called from within the Leaf's vat.

Leaf(StandardVat, Object)
Construct a Leaf with the given vat and target.

Parameters:
theVat - the vat that this Root points into
theTarget - the target object that this Root points at
